chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: ModuleSpace R_Ring
f: R -> V
ptd: SF_seq

Goal:
SF_sorted Rle ptd -> SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> Riemann_sum f ptd = zero

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
Riemann_sum = fun (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Notation ModuleSpace := ModuleSpace.type
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
Riemann_sum_rcons : forall (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) (l0 : R * R), Riemann_sum f (SF_rcons ptd l0) = plus (Riemann_sum f ptd) (scal (fst l0 - last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd)) (f (snd l0)))
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd)
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
SF_map_sort : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop), SF_sorted Ord s -> SF_sorted Ord (SF_map f0 s) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cut_up_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cut_up ptd x
SF_cut_down_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons h (SF_cut_down ptd x)
SF_cut_up_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (snd h) x) ptd
SF_cut_up_l : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> last (SF_h (SF_cut_up s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)
scal_zero_r : forall x : ?K, scal x zero = zero where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_one : forall u : ?V, scal one u = u where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_zero_l : forall u : ?V, scal zero u = zero where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
SF_cut_down_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (fst h, Rmin (snd h) x) (SF_nil x)
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
scal_opp_one : forall u : ?V, scal (opp one) u = opp u where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
prod_scal_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?U * ?V), prod_scal (plus x y) u = prod_plus (prod_scal x u) (prod_scal y u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?U : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
prod_scal_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?U * ?V), prod_scal x (prod_plus u v) = prod_plus (prod_scal x u) (prod_scal x v) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?U : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_opp_r : forall (x : ?K) (u : ?V), scal x (opp u) = opp (scal x u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_opp_l : forall (x : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (opp x) u = opp (scal x u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
scal_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?V), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_minus_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?V), scal x (minus u v) = minus (scal x u) (scal x v) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_minus_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (minus x y) u = minus (scal x u) (scal y u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace ?K]
SF_fun_incr : forall (s : SF_seq) (y0 : ?T) (x : R) (Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s)) (Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s)), SF_fun s y0 x = match sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx with | inleft H => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (proj1_sig H) | inright _ => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (SF_size s - 1) end where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
foldr_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f0 x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x0) s where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
plus_reg_r : forall r x y : ?G, plus x r = plus y r -> x = y where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- AbelianGroup]
unzip1_rcons : forall (s : seq (?S * ?T)) (h : ?S * ?T), unzip1 (rcons s h) = rcons (unzip1 s) (fst h) where ?S : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_size_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_size (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = Init.Nat.pred (size P) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_lx_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (0 < size P)%nat -> SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = P where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
pairmap_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T -> ?T0) (s : seq ?T) (h0 h x0 : ?T), pairmap f0 x0 (rcons (rcons s h0) h) = rcons (pairmap f0 x0 (rcons s h0)) (f0 h0 h) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_ly_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = behead (pairmap f2 0 P) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
plus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, plus x zero = x where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- AbelianGroup]
plus_zero_l : forall x : ?G, plus zero x = x where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- AbelianGroup]
plus_opp_l : forall x : ?G, plus (opp x) x = zero where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq |- AbelianGroup]

```coq
intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast.
unfold Riemann_sum.
rewrite Hlast.
rewrite foldr_rcons.
rewrite Riemann_sum_rcons.
rewrite scal_zero_r.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast. unfold Riemann_sum. rewrite Hlast. rewrite foldr_rcons. rewrite Riemann_sum_rcons. rewrite scal_zero_r. reflexivity.
